subject: [Radiance-general] trouble 'Rendering with Radiance'!
body:
Hi



I've had the book 'Rendering with radiance' on order from Amazon for a
number of weeks. Received a message last night that they were unable to
source the book. Any tips on alternative supplier [currently trying
ABEbooks.com] welcome.



Regards
Sean Mooney
Project Management
Killakee House,
Belgard Square,
Tallaght,
Dublin 24,
Ireland
w: www.pmg.ie <http://www.pmg.ie/> .
e: sean.mooney@pmg.ie <mailto:sean.mooney@pmg.ie>
t: +353 (1) 4040700
f: +353 (1) 4599785
